successes.title: PARKE: Premium Active Denim - Engineered for Performance
successes.description: Premium jeans featuring technologically advanced denim, high quality craftsmanship, and exceptional fit.

Pledges.description: THANK YOU CARD. It's time to bring technology into the final frontier: your closet. With a $15 pledge, we'll send you a thank you card and also include a sample swatch of our Premium ACTIVE Denim.

PREMIUM ACTIVE DENIM. You'll get 1 pair of our Premium Active Denim jeans. We GUARANTEE that you'll instantly feel the difference, or the return is on us. We're selling these on Kickstarter at our wholesale price of only $89.

BLACK DENIM. You'll get 1 pair of our Black Denim jeans.  Get the supreme comfort of technologically advanced stretch denim, but in black - a classic wardrobe staple. We GUARANTEE that you'll instantly feel the difference, or the return is on us.

DOUBLE ACTIVE DENIM. You'll get 2 pairs of our Premium Active Denim jeans. We GUARANTEE that you'll instantly feel the difference, or the return is on us. We're selling these on Kickstarter for a limited time at our wholesale price.

DOUBLE BLACK DENIM.  You'll get 2 pairs of our Black Denim jeans.  Get the supreme comfort of technologically advanced stretch denim, but in black - a classic wardrobe staple. We GUARANTEE that you'll instantly feel the difference, or the return is on us.
THE SET.  You'll get 1 pair of our Premium Active Denim (dark indigo) and also 1 pair of our Black Denim.
4 PACK.  You'll get 4 jeans of your choice.  Mix and match across all of our styles and sizes for Premium Active Denim or Black Denim.
